title: error 0xc0000005
body: I cannot get to the login screen since the new client from 24 april, when i press play im always getting the same error (0xc0000005) and it's been going on for more than a week now i've read that those kind of errors occur because of anti viruses or a problem with the windows registry and i know for a fact it's not my anti virus (avast) because i've added league to the exception list and even totally disabled it but i still get the same error every time, so the problem is in my registry the thing is i dont know what and how to fix this help me please.

replies.body: The best way to verify if an antivirus *isn't* causing the issue is to **uninstall** it. You are definitely correct, 005 errors are often caused by antiviruses, but it can also be caused by a [**lack of administrative rights**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104). If the issues stick, hit me up in a [**Tech Support Ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)!

game and launcher are running as admin and always have been, i double checked permissions several times there is absolutely no reason the game wouldn't launch properly because of antivirus or admin rights, i also uninstalled my antivirus completely. I reinstalled the game at least 4 times trying different methods  i found over the internet from people having the same issue nothing is working, and ive read on this very forum a riot employee saying that it could be as you said lack of admin rights or a problem with the windows registry and on my opinion it's a registry problem it'S not the first time i have to temper with it but i had clear and simple instructions to follow and it always worked in the end, that being said i fully aware that the most obvious fix would be to format and reinstall my windows 7 as it have been at least 6 or 7 years my computer have not been formatted but i just cant do it for the moment I will write a ticket as you said and hope for a way to fix it even if it's just temporary.
I'm having the same issue. I excluded it from my antivirus, and I've even uninstalled and reinstalled the game. Nothing seems to be fixing the problem.
